nodes.text: The Kokash system was a star system located within the Kokash sector, a part of the galaxy's Core Worlds region. It was visited in the year 27 BBY by the colonization and exploration vessel Outbound Flight on a shakedown cruise through the territory of the Galactic Republic.
The Kokash system was first introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square J-10.
